name: Egg Clicker
description:
Did you know?

Clicking is one of the best way of time passing.

Fidget spinners or cubes are some times boring and expensive. But clicking is relaxing and free to. But you need some thing to click on and counting each click is a pain. So I made Egg Clicker. Just click on the egg and relax. The score is automatically counted. And the store makes it more fun. Don't worry, there is no micro transactions. Buy with your score.

Whats new in 0.2?
  • Major bug fixes
  • Fixed scroll wheel issue
  • Fixed Store buttons
  • Shopkeeper now thanks you for each purchase
